THIS COLLEGE WAS FOUNDED
BY
MR. J. N. GUPTA, I.C.S
MAGISTRATE COLLECTOR OF RANGPUR 1913-17

 

The following gentlemen worked with Mr. Gupta and were instrumental in establishing the college and raising necessary funds from the people of the district for the construction of the college buildings and for the maintenance of the college.

  1. Mr. S. C. Mallik I.C.S.
  2. Babu Asutosh Lahiri, B.C.E.
  3. Mr. Ramani Mohan Das, Dy. Collector
  4. Babu Sriman Kumar Das Gupta, Dy. Collector
  5. Babu Jogendra Lal Nandi, Dy. Collector
  6. Babu Jogesh Chandra Dutta, Dy. Collector
  7. Babu Bhujendra Nath Mukharji, Dy. Collector
  8. Mr. A. P. Peters, Dy. Collector
  9. Maulvi Shamsuddin Ahmed, Dy. Collector
  10. Babu Hari Charan Bose, Dy. Collector
  11. Babu Gyan Ranjan Mukharji, Circle Officer
  12. Babu Mahatap Chandra Ghosh, Circle Officer
  13. Maulvi Akbar Hussain Ahmed, Sub-Dy. Collector
  14. Rai Bahadur Sarat Chandra Chatterjee
  15. Babu Radha Raman Majumdar
  16. Architect & Contractor Babu Pulin Chandra Roy, B.A.C.E.
  17. Engineer Babu Manindra Nath Sadhu, C.E.
  18. Babu Surendra Chandra Roy Chowdhury
